design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Brutalism with Corporate Strategy.
Emotion First: Every interaction must feel 'premium' and 'calculated'.
Content is King: Typography is the main visual element.
Negative Space: Massive padding (py-32) to signal luxury/confidence.
Dark Mode Only: As per brand requirements.

typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts: Syne (400, 700, 800) and Manrope (400, 500, 600).

colors.rules: Dark mode strictly. No solid white backgrounds. Use subtle borders and glow effects for separation.

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-white text-black px-8 py-4 font-bold hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300
buttons.secondary: rounded-full border border-white/20 bg-transparent text-white px-8 py-4 hover:bg-white/10 transition-colors
buttons.link: text-white underline decoration-white/30 underline-offset-4 hover:decoration-white transition-all

cards.classes: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-2xl p-8 hover:border-white/20 transition-all duration-500 group

inputs.classes: bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 rounded-none px-0 py-4 focus:border-white transition-colors placeholder:text-white/30 text-white

navigation.container: bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-3 flex items-center gap-6

animations.parallax: Use useScroll and useTransform for subtle y-axis movement on images.

visual_enhancers.noise: Add a fixed position div with a noise svg overlay at 3% opacity to kill flat colors.
visual_enhancers.glow_orbs: Use absolute positioned divs with heavy blur (blur-[100px]) for ambient lighting.

content_strategy.tagline: Strategic Intelligence for the Modern Age.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it is the main hero title.
Ensure 3:1 contrast ratio for all text.
Use data-testid for all interactive elements.
Never center align long text blocks.
instructions_to_main_agent: Create a 'Noise' component for the background texture.
Implement the 'Syne' font via Google Fonts in index.css.
Use the Bento Grid layout for the Services section.
Ensure the contact form links directly to the provided JotForm URL.
